DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effect combine vitamin A ( VA ) , zinc ( Z ) multivitamins ( MV- A , B1 , B2 , B6 , B12 , C , D E ) malaria morbidity
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Vitamin A With Without Zinc Multivitamin Supplementation Malaria Morbidity Ghanaian Children
DOC.detailed_description: A total 542 child age 6-59 month receive either : ( ) VA ( control ) ( ii ) VA & Z ( VAZ ) ( iii ) VA , Z & MV ( VAZM ) . VA deliver single dose MV Z deliver daily . Malaria case manage community health worker , use rapid diagnostic test confirm infection prior treatment .
